titles.title: HP359 Praise, O praise our God and King

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1 v6 c1 v7 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Praise, O praise our God and King!
Hymns of adoration sing:

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Praise him that he gave the rain
To mature the swelling grain:

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
And has bid the fruitful field
Crops of precious increase yield:

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Praise him for our harvest store;
He has filled the garner floor:

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
And for richer food than this,
Pledge of everlasting bliss:

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Glory to our bounteous King!
Glory let creation sing:

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
Glory to the Father, Son,
And blest Spirit, Three in One.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
For his mercies still endure,
Ever faithful, ever sure.
